Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Forfeits per diem payments to members of the legislature when the budget is late
Summary: Forfeits per diem payments to members of the legislature when the budget is not passed by April 1.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to eliminating per diem payments to members of the legislature when the legislature has not passed a budget by the first day of the fiscal year
